issue.title: [C++] Add default implementations for TypeVisitor, ArrayVisitor methods that return NotImplemented
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-568](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-568). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This will reduce boilerplate in some visitor implementations that only implement a subset of the methods
